title: Executive Order 5839-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Ralph A. Vestal
content: Mr. Ralph A. Vestal may be appointed to the position of junior clerk in the Department of State without compliance with the requirements of the civil-service rules.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5839-Authorizing the Appointment of Mr. Ralph A. Vestal Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361438
